a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Alcohol consumption per person in the United States, 1850 to 2013
Alcohol consumption per person, measured in litres of ethanol per person per year. From 1920-1933 there was a
ban on the production, importation, transportation, and sale of alcoholic beverages (prohibition) in the United
Data source: National Institute on Alcohol Abuse and Alcoholism (NIAAA)
